Question: Sodium, Na, is in the same group as

Choices:
A: Ne.
B: Mg.
C: Ca.
D: K.
steps: Identify the group of sodium (Na) in the periodic table. Sodium is in Group 1 (the alkali metals).
Determine which of the choices are in the same group as sodium. The elements in Group 1 include Li (Lithium), Na (Sodium), K (Potassium), Rb (Rubidium), Cs (Cesium), and Fr (Francium).

Evaluate each choice against the identified group:
- A: Ne (Neon) is in Group 18 (noble gases).
- B: Mg (Magnesium) is in Group 2 (alkaline earth metals).
- C: Ca (Calcium) is also in Group 2 (alkaline earth metals).
- D: K (Potassium) is in Group 1 (alkali metals).
Since K (Potassium) is the only choice that is in the same group (Group 1) as Na (Sodium), it is the correct answer.
